title: Miguel Ángel Gamboa
text:
Miguel Ángel Luis Gamboa Pedemonte (born June 21, 1951 in <a href="Santiago%20de%20Chile">Santiago</a>) is a retired <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="Striker%20%28association%20football%29">striker</a> from <a href="Chile">Chile</a>. He represented his <a href="Chile%20national%20football%20team">native country</a> at the <a href="1982%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1982 FIFA World Cup</a>, wearing the number 21 jersey. He also played for several clubs in Chile, including <a href="Universidad%20de%20Chile">Universidad de Chile</a> and <a href="Colo%20Colo">Colo Colo</a>, and in <a href="Mexico">Mexico</a> for <a href="Tecos%20UAG">Tecos UAG</a> and <a href="Club%20Am%C3%A9rica">América</a>.
Gamboa is the current coach of the <a href="Rapanui%20national%20football%20team">Rapanui national football team</a>.
